name: eggd_confirmation_thresholds
title: eggd_confirmation_thresholds
summary: Takes a pair of VCFs, one from hap.py and the other from Sentieon (the former must be generated from the latter) and a list of QC metrics. Produces an HTML report showing the distributions of all the requested metrics, split by True/False Positive status. Use to determine QC thresholds at which Sanger confirmation of variants may be skipped.

inputSpec.name: happy_vcf
inputSpec.help: The VCF produced by hap.py containing SNP/INDEL, HET/HOM info for TRUTH and QUERY samples.

inputSpec.name: sentieon_vcf
inputSpec.help: The VCF produced by Sentieon (variant calling). Must be the VCF used to generate the hap.py VCF.

inputSpec.name: metric_list
inputSpec.help: A comma separated list (no spaces) of VCF QC metrics to be included in the report.

outputSpec.name: html_report
outputSpec.help: An HTML report with distribution plots for all requested metrics (if available in input VCF).
